text:
She's worked hard to get into shape and stay trim.
And Charlotte Crosby was flaunting the results of her fitness regime as she proudly unveiled her new In The Style swimsuit range in a sizzling new bikini shoot.
The former Geordie Shore star also discussed her blossoming romance with her boyfriend Stephen Bear and how to feel body confident.

Charlotte told MailOnline: 'Being with Stephen bear makes me broody'.
The bubbly beauty also revealed that Bear is a big fan of her swimwear range, and loves seeing her in the pieces on their romantic getaways together.
Quizzed what her favourite part of her body is, the beauty revealed it was her legs, adding that her bikini body inspiration is Pamela Anderson in her Baywatch days.
The 26-year-old star's fitness mission has suffered wobbles due to her party lifestyle, but in recent months she has curbed her nights out and prioritised the gym.
